verses.verse: Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8104>"Keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"So it shall be on the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> you shall <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, that you shall <S%H6965>set<s%> up for yourself <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H7874>coat<s%> them with <S%H7875>lime<s%>

and <S%H3789>write<s%> on them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> when you <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you may <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, <S%H1>promised<s%> you.

"So it shall be when you <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> you shall <S%H6965>set<s%> up on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H9403>Ebal,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> as I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> and you shall <S%H7874>coat<s%> them with <S%H7875>lime.<s%>

"Moreover, you shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H68>stones;<s%> you shall not <S%H5130>wield<s%> an <S%H1270>iron<s%> [tool] on them.

"You shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8003>uncut<s%> <S%H68>stones;<s%> and you shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> on it <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%>

and you shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> on the <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H3190>very<s%> <S%H874>distinctly.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Be <S%H5535>silent<s%> and <S%H8085>listen,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"You shall therefore <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H2706>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> also <S%H6680>charged<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"When you <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

"And for the <S%H7045>curse,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H9403>Ebal:<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
"The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall then <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7311>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%>

<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>makes<s%> an <S%H6459>idol<s%> or a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>image,<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>craftsman,<s%> and <S%H7760>sets<s%> [it] up in <S%H5643>secret.<s%>' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'
<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H7034>dishonors<s%> his father or <S%H1>mother.<s%>' And <S%H517>all<s%> the <S%H3605>people<s%> shall <S%H5971>say,<s%> <S%H559>'Amen.<s%>'
<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H5472>moves<s%> his neighbor's <S%H1366>boundary<s%> mark.' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'
<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H7686>misleads<s%> a <S%H5787>blind<s%> [person] on the <S%H1870>road.<s%>' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'

<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H5186>distorts<s%> the <S%H4941>justice<s%> due an <S%H1616>alien,<s%> <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> and <S%H490>widow.<s%>' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'

<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his father's <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his father's <S%H3671>skirt.<s%>' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'
<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>animal.<s%>' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'

<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his <S%H269>sister,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of his father <S%H1>or<s%> of his <S%H176>mother.<s%>' And <S%H517>all<s%> the <S%H3605>people<s%> shall <S%H5971>say,<s%> <S%H559>'Amen.<s%>'
<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his mother-in-law.' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'
<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H5221>strikes<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> in <S%H5643>secret.<s%>' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'

<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H3947>accepts<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> to <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> an <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H5315>person.<s%>' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'

<S%H779>'Cursed<s%> is he <S%H834>who<s%> does not <S%H6965>confirm<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> by <S%H6213>doing<s%> them.' And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>'Amen.<s%>'
